channel.title: How do I include my .sig with my Pak mod?
channel.description:
So I've made a [mod](https://github.com/sh4d0w4RCH3R415/BetterResources-FGMod), but I don't know how to make it so that SML loads the .sig *with* the .pak file.
If anyone knows a solution to this, ***please help me***, as I would **greatly appreciate it**.

item.title: How do I include my .sig with my Pak mod?
